title: Gifting Rakan/Xayah
body: Does the icon you get for that immediately get added to your account?  I've seen plenty of people with their icon, but I do not have mine yet even though I gifted it with IP.  Just curious if I just need to wait.  I also didn't get the icon for playing 2 games with a Xayah/Rakan as Rakan/Xayah yet.

replies.body: it takes a little time for it to get added i believe
oh wow I didn't know that you get icon as well. Didn't read much up on it.

Sweet, thanks.  I was just getting a little nervous after 2 days with it not being available to use and seeing people who gifted the champions with IP after me being able to use the icon before me.  I'll be patient.
